metadata.Title: CVE-2021-37964 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Inappropriate implementation in ChromeOS Networking in Google Chrome onChromeOS prior to 94.0.4606.54 allowed an attacker with a rogue wirelessaccess point to to potentially carryout a wifi impersonation attack via acrafted ONC file.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
